parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The name of the database account.

parameters.name: AccountType
parameters.description: The type of the database account that you want to query. Valid values: Super, Normal, and All. Default value: Super. If you set this parameter to Super, the information about the privileged account is returned. If you set this parameter to Normal, the information about all standard accounts is returned. If you set this parameter to All, the information about all database accounts is returned.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.
